Package com.ntu.scse

Class ReservationMgr

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ntu.scse.ReservationMgr

  • public class ReservationMgr
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a hotel Reservation Manager that contains a list of all reservations as well as methods for manipulating those reservations. One ReservationManager can contain many Reservations.
    Since:
    19/04/2018
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Cai LingZhi, Liu Fangbing, Christopher Lim, Eliza Wong

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ReservationMgr​(java.util.ArrayList reservationList)
      Creates a Reservation Manager based on loaded data from a file.

      Adds a reservation to the master list based on the details provided Automatically generates a new unique identifier

    • Constructor Detail

      • ReservationMgr

        public ReservationMgr​(java.util.ArrayList reservationList)
        Creates a Reservation Manager based on loaded data from a file. If no previous data was present, initialize an empty master list.
        Parameters:
        reservationList - The list received from Main. If there was previous data, use this, else, create an empty list.

    • Method Detail

      • resvOptions

        public void resvOptions​(GuestMgr gm,
                        RoomMgr rm)
        Shoes the main menu for all reservation-related operations Refreshes Reservation list (sorts based on reservation ID) after every operation
        Parameters:
        gm - the Guest Manager object for guest-related operations
        rm - the Room Manager object for room-related operations

      • createNewResv

        public Reservation createNewResv​(GuestMgr gm,
                                 RoomMgr rm,
                                 boolean walkIn)
        Asks user for relevant information before creating a new reservation Checks if the guest is already in the database or is a new guest
        Parameters:
        gm - the Guest Manager object for guest-related operations
        rm - the Room Manager object for room-related operations
        walkIn - a flag to check if the guest is a walk-in guest or has a prior reservation
        Returns:
        the newly created reservation

      • addResv

        public Reservation addResv​(java.lang.String roomNo,
                           java.lang.String roomType,
                           int gID,
                           int aNo,
                           int kNo,
                           java.time.LocalDate dIn,
                           java.time.LocalDate dOut,
                           java.lang.String rStatus,
                           java.time.LocalTime time)
        Adds a reservation to the master list based on the details provided Automatically generates a new unique identifier
        Parameters:
        roomNo - The room number associated with this reservation
        roomType - The room type associated with this reservation
        gID - The guest ID associated with this reservation
        aNo - The number of adults in this reservation
        kNo - The number of kids in this reservation
        dIn - The check in date of this reservation
        dOut - The check out date of this reservation
        rStatus - the status of this reservation
        time - the date and time this reservation was placed
        Returns:
        the newly created reservation

      • readReservationList

        public void readReservationList​()
        Prints out the entire reservation list.

      • readReservationListByStatus

        public int readReservationListByStatus​(int choice)
        Prints out selected reservations based on their status.
        Parameters:
        choice - the choice of reservations the user wants to print out 1 = "CONFIRMED", 2 = "IN WAITLIST", 3 = "CHECKED-IN", 4 = "CHECKED-OUT", 5 = "EXPIRED"
        Returns:
        the number of reservations that match the status selected

      • readReservation

        public void readReservation​(Reservation r)
        Prints out the details of a specific reservation.
        Parameters:
        r - The reservation to print

      • updateResvOption

        public void updateResvOption​(RoomMgr rm)
        Shows the menu for updating reservation details. Details of a reservation that can be updated are: Room number Number of adults Number of kids Check in date Check out date Reservation Status
        Parameters:
        rm - The room manager for any room-related operations

      • updateResv

        public void updateResv​(RoomMgr rm,
                       Reservation r,
                       int choice,
                       int numGuest)
        Executes the updating of reservation details based on choice of detail to update.
        Parameters:
        rm - The room manager for any room-related operations
        r - The Reservation to update
        choice - The choice of detail to update
        numGuest - The number of Guests in the selected reservation

      • searchReservation

        public Reservation searchReservation​(int resvNo)
        Searches for a specific reservation using the unique reservation number.
        Parameters:
        resvNo - the unique reservation number to search for
        Returns:
        returns the Reservation object if a match is found

      • doesGuestHaveResv

        public boolean doesGuestHaveResv​(int guestID)
        Searches if there is a specific reservation which is made under a specific guest ID, and also if that reservation's status is either confirmed or checked-in
        Parameters:
        guestID - the Guest ID to find a reservation from
        Returns:
        returns true if the specified guest has a reservation that is either confirmed or checked-in, else returns false

      • removeReservation

        public void removeReservation​(RoomMgr rm)
        Asks user for the unique reservation number to remove before attempting to remove if it exists.
        Parameters:
        rm - The room manager for room-specific operations

      • refreshReservations

        public void refreshReservations​(RoomMgr rm)
        Checks all reservation check in dates and compares it with the current date. If the check in date is before today's date, those reservations will automatically be set to expired.
        Parameters:
        rm - The room manager for room-specific operations

      • saveToFile

        public java.util.List<Reservation> saveToFile​()
        Gives the master list back to main to write to file
        Returns:
        the master reservation list
